question: Who among the following is a banking corresponding agent?
option1: An authorized representative of bank who offer banking services in unbanked areas
option2: Any person who offer banking services in unbanked areas
option3: An authorized representative of bank who makes profits for banks
answer: An authorized representative of bank who offer banking services in unbanked areas
explanation: Business Correspondents are retail agents engaged by banks for providing banking services at locations other than a bank branch/ATM. BCs enable a bank to provide its limited range of banking services at low cost.
